articles.content: Amid grim outlook of oil supply in the market, oil prices rallied more than $1 on Tuesday. The continuous three-week oil price rally was fuelled by weak U.S. shale output and supply concerns from ext… [+3062 chars]

articles.title: JSW Infra has sufficient cash flows to fund future expansion: JSW Infra Joint MD & CEO Arun Maheshwari - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Thermal energy consumption in India will peak by 2050, despite the push for green energy. This leaves a good two to three decades for coal demand to grow in India, he added
articles.content: JSW Infra does not have any plans to raise funds after its initial public offering (IPO), the company's Joint Managing Director (Jt MD) and Chief Executive Officer (CEO) Arun Maheshwari told Moneycon… [+9439 chars]

articles.title: XAU/USD Price Forecast: Gold Tentative as FOMC Looms - DailyFX
articles.description: Gold prices hover around $1930 as traders await guidance from Fed Chair Jerome Powell as to the future of the US interest rate cycle.
articles.content:
GOLD OUTLOOK & ANALYSIS
